mapper.select: SELECT -- 组织表 d.`dept_id`, d.`name` AS org_name, d.org_short_name, -- 操作 n.create_time AS operatingTime, n.create_username AS operator, ds.`name` AS operatorPartyOrganizationName, ds.org_short_name AS operatorPartyOrganizationShortName, -- 新闻资讯表 n.news_id, n.title, n.cover, n.type, n.content, n.publish_time, n.publish_status, n.watch_num, n.top_status, n.order_num, -- 附件信息 '65' as attachment_type, ifnull(t.video_num, 0) video_num, ifnull(t.img_num, 0) img_num, ifnull(t.doc_num, 0) doc_num FROM tab_pb_party_news n INNER JOIN sys_dept d ON n.org_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON n.create_userid = u.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept ds ON u.dept_id = ds.dept_id LEFT JOIN view_attachment_count t ON n.news_id = t.host_id AND t.attachment_type = 65 WHERE n.del_flag = 0 AND n.news_id = #{newsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
